items.title: Coffee Chat
items.subtitle: Social Blend
items.description: Premium coffee blend designed for social gatherings and casual drinking. Smooth, approachable flavor with low acidity. Perfect for sharing with friends and family. Medium roast with notes of chocolate and caramel.

items.title: Senwan American Coffee
items.subtitle: Classic American Blend
items.description: Classic American-style coffee blend with balanced flavor profile. Medium-dark roast with traditional American coffee characteristics. Perfect for drip brewing and everyday consumption. Consistent quality and reliable performance.

items.title: C-Roast Coffee
items.subtitle: Dark Roast Excellence
items.description: Dark roast coffee blend with intense flavor and rich body. Slow-roasted to develop deep, complex characteristics. Low acidity with bold chocolate and spice notes. Perfect for espresso and strong coffee lovers.

items.title: Essse Coffee
items.subtitle: Italian Espresso Blend
items.description: Authentic Italian espresso blend with perfect crema formation. Traditional roast profile with balanced acidity and body. Notes of dark chocolate, roasted nuts, and caramel. The essence of Italian espresso tradition.

items.title: 1882 Coffee
items.subtitle: Heritage Blend
items.description: Classic coffee blend honoring traditional roasting methods since 1882. Time-tested recipe with consistent quality. Medium roast with well-balanced flavor and aroma. A heritage blend that stands the test of time.

items.title: Gourmet Coffee
items.subtitle: Premium Selection
items.description: Premium gourmet coffee featuring specialty grade beans. Sourced from renowned growing regions worldwide. Complex flavor profile with distinct origin characteristics. For coffee connoisseurs who appreciate quality and complexity.

items.title: Jevan Coffee
items.subtitle: Specialty Craft Blend
items.description: Specialty coffee blend crafted for discerning palates. Unique combination of beans from different origins. Medium roast that highlights bean complexity. Perfect for both filter brewing and espresso.

items.title: Caffe Diemme
items.subtitle: Italian Premium Roast
items.description: Italian premium coffee roasted in small batches. Artisanal approach with attention to detail. Rich, full-bodied with velvety texture. Authentic Italian coffee experience in every cup.

items.title: Illy Intenso
items.subtitle: Bold Italian Blend
items.description: Intense Italian coffee blend from the prestigious Illy brand. Dark roast with robust flavor and full body. 100% Arabica beans with low acidity. The perfect choice for those who prefer strong, bold coffee.

items.title: Lavazza Coffee
items.subtitle: Italian Classic
items.description: Classic Italian coffee from the renowned Lavazza family. Balanced blend with smooth flavor and pleasant aroma. Perfect for espresso and all brewing methods. Italy's favorite coffee for over a century.

items.title: Senwan Coffee
items.subtitle: Premium House Blend
items.description: Premium coffee blend with consistent quality and flavor. Well-balanced with medium body and pleasant acidity. Versatile for various brewing methods. Reliable choice for daily coffee enjoyment.

items.title: Rilassato Coffee
items.subtitle: Relaxing Blend
items.description: Relaxing coffee blend with smooth, mellow characteristics. Low acidity and gentle on the stomach. Perfect for evening enjoyment or sensitive palates. Soothing flavor with subtle herbal notes.

items.title: Roasting House
items.subtitle: Fresh Artisanal Roast
items.description: Fresh roasted coffee from small-batch artisanal roasters. Roasted to order for maximum freshness and flavor. Direct trade relationships with coffee farmers. Experience the difference of truly fresh coffee.

items.title: Swaa Coffee
items.subtitle: African Origin Blend
items.description: African coffee blend featuring beans from Ethiopia and Kenya. Bright acidity with floral and fruity notes. Light-medium roast that highlights origin characteristics. For those who appreciate the unique flavors of African coffees.

items.title: Soil Coffee
items.subtitle: Single Origin Selection
items.description: Single origin coffee showcasing unique terroir characteristics. Traceable to specific farms and regions. Each batch tells the story of its origin. Perfect for coffee enthusiasts who value transparency and unique flavors.

items.title: Kiffa Coffee
items.subtitle: Ethiopian Heritage
items.description: Ethiopian coffee blend honoring the birthplace of coffee. Traditional processing methods with authentic flavors. Complex with wine-like acidity and berry notes. Experience the original coffee flavors from Ethiopia.

items.title: Black Night Coffee
items.subtitle: Midnight Dark Roast
items.description: Dark roast coffee blend with intense, bold character. Roasted until oils glisten on the bean surface. Smoky notes with deep chocolate undertones. The ultimate choice for night owls and strong coffee lovers.

items.title: Molinari Coffee
items.subtitle: Italian Premium Selection
items.description: Italian premium coffee with sophisticated flavor profile. Carefully selected beans from premium growing regions. Traditional Italian roasting techniques. Elegant and refined coffee experience.

items.title: Drip On Coffee
items.subtitle: Pour-Over Specialist
items.description: Pour-over coffee blend optimized for manual brewing methods. Specific grind size and roast profile for perfect extraction. Clean, bright flavors with excellent clarity. Designed for coffee enthusiasts who appreciate the pour-over ritual.

items.title: Illy Coffee
items.subtitle: Italian Premium Classic
items.description: Premium Italian coffee from the iconic Illy brand. 100% Arabica blend with perfect balance and aroma. Consistent quality in every can. The gold standard of Italian coffee enjoyed worldwide.
